original_text: Oh that my grief were throughly weighed, and my calamity laid in the balances together!
korean_text: 나의 괴로움을 달아 보며 나의 파멸을 저울 위에 모두 놓을 수 있다면

sentences.original_text: Oh that my grief were throughly weighed
and my calamity laid in the balances together
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 재앙이 저울에 함께 올려지면 좋으리라
